stories.text:
Hi all,

I'm looking to create a simple automation where I can change a few variables (date, terms etc) in a google doc contract and then automatically convert to pdf, add signature/date and fire off to client. Can anyone recommend a good software for this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Contract Automation Software
About Intellipedia and other intelligence wikis from the Snowden trove

stories.text: I've used Oracle BPM in large enterprise projects, it is a good product, although one has to pay a fortune to license it. For smaller projects I am looking for alternatives, and currently evaluating Camunda. It is open source, lightweight, but it is not clear how to work with business data. One has to create own UI forms, as the existing feature is far away from being suitable. What other alternative exist that you can recommend?
stories.title: Ask HN: What BPM solution do you use?
